Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of three lines of red-painted Greek text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394187) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394187)
